subject: I hope this mail meets you w
body:
I hope this mail meets you well. I duly apologize if I am interfering
with your privacy if this request is not acceptable to you.
My name is Mary Kay Bosell I am a Banker, I am contacting you because
you share the same last name with our client who died of Covid-19 with
his wife and his two sons in March (2020).The Bank has been on the
outlook to contact his next of kin without success hence I contacted
you since you share same surname with our client.
I want to present you as the next of Kin / beneficiary for immediate
payment of this fund.. As of today, my client's cash investment with
the Bank Stands at US$10 Million (Ten Million
United States Dollars)
Get back to me, if you are interested in more information through my
private email address below
Opportunity comes but once
Best Regards.
Mary K. Bosell

subject: Re:   I hope this mail meets you w
body:
Hello Mary K. Bosell,

I hope this message finds you in good health. I must say, your email has certainly piqued my interest! It's not every day that one receives such an intriguing proposition.

However, I do have a few questions if you don't mind me asking. Firstly, could you please provide more details about the client who shares my last name? It's quite a surprise to hear that I might be related to someone who had such a significant amount of money in the bank.

Secondly, how did you manage to find me? My surname is quite common, so I'm curious as to how you were able to pinpoint me specifically as the next of kin.

Lastly, what would be the process for claiming this fund? Is there any paperwork involved?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Paul
